content.title: ✨ Whimsy Realms Update: 5 New Miniatures in the Works! ✨
content.creator:
AXO Studio
March 1, 2025
content.content:
Great news, adventurers! 🌟 We’re hard at work on 5 brand-new characters, adding even more magic and charm to the world of Whimsy Realms! 🏰✨
While these miniatures are still in development, you can already add them to your pledge as an add-on! 🎉 Get ahead and secure these upcoming designs for your collection!
Thank you for your incredible support! Stay tuned for sneak peeks soon! 👀💖
📢 Upgrade your pledge now to claim these magical new minis!

content.title: ✨ Whimsy Realms Update: Add-On System Improved! ✨
content.creator:
AXO Studio
February 19, 2025
content.content:
Great news, adventurers! 🌟 We’ve reworked our Add-On System to make things even better! Now, instead of separate pledge tiers, all previous miniatures are available as add-ons—giving you full flexibility to customize your pledge exactly how you want! 🎉
🔥 What This Means for You:
✔️ No need to choose between sets—mix & match your favorites!
✔️ Easily expand your collection with past releases.
✔️ More freedom to build the ultimate Whimsy Realms lineup!
Thank you for your feedback and support! 💖 Now go forth and create your perfect mini collection! ✨
📢 Update your pledge and grab the minis you love!
#WhimsyRealms #KickstarterUpdate #MiniatureAddOns #TabletopGaming #MiniaturePainting

content.title: 🐻🔥 Bearmy Legends Has Launched on Kickstarter! 🔥🐻
content.creator:
AXO Studio
February 19, 2025
content.content:
The time has come, warriors! Bearmy Legends is now live on Kickstarter! 🏆⚔️ Assemble your army of legendary bear warriors and bring them to life in your tabletop battles, dioramas, and collections.
🛡️ Why Join the Bearmy?
✅ Highly detailed fantasy bear miniatures – knights, barbarians, druids, assassins, and more!
✅ Perfect for painting & customizing – every model is full of character and intricate details.
✅ Exclusive Kickstarter rewards – get limited-edition miniatures and stretch goals!
👉 Back the project now! 👈

content.title: ✨ Exciting News from Whimsy Realms! ✨
content.creator:
AXO Studio
February 17, 2025
content.content:
We’re expanding the magic! 🌟 A brand-new Add-On Pack featuring 5 enchanting miniatures has been added to the project! 🏰✨ From playful woodland spirits to brave little adventurers, these new characters bring even more charm and personality to your collection.
🔥 What’s Inside?
✔️ 5 brand-new, highly detailed miniatures
✔️ Perfect for painting, collecting, and gaming
✔️ Available as an exclusive add-on for backers!
Don’t miss this chance to bring even more whimsy to your tabletop! 💫
📢 Upgrade your pledge now and claim these magical minis!

comments.text: I'm still not seeing this in the add-on list when reviewing my pledge.
